subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Luis Castillo and the Mets are nearing completion on a four-year, $25 million deal that will establish continuity at a position that has lacked it during Manager Willie Randolph’s tenure.
snippet: Luis Castillo and the Mets are nearing completion on a four-year, $25 million deal that will establish continuity at a position that has lacked it during Manager Willie Randolph’s tenure.
